About.title: Topicrem & Novexpert
About.subtitle: French Skincare Excellence
About.storyContent: We are proud to bring two leading French skincare brands to Jordan: Topicrem and Novexpert. Both brands represent the pinnacle of French skincare expertise, combining rich heritage of dermatological research with modern innovation. Our mission is to bring you the finest skincare products trusted by dermatologists and consumers worldwide.

topicrem.title: Topicrem
topicrem.subtitle: Dermatological Expertise Since 2003
topicrem.description: Topicrem is a French skincare brand specializing in dermatological solutions for sensitive skin. With products tested and recommended by dermatologists, Topicrem offers safe, effective, and gentle skincare solutions for all skin types.

novexpert.title: Novexpert
novexpert.subtitle: Expert Science, Natural Innovation
novexpert.description: Novexpert combines scientific expertise with natural ingredients to create powerful anti-aging and skin health solutions. Made in France with a commitment to efficacy and eco-responsibility, Novexpert offers advanced formulations backed by research.

frenchExcellence.title: French Excellence
frenchExcellence.description: Both brands embody the French commitment to quality and innovation in skincare

expertFormulas.title: Expert Formulas
expertFormulas.description: Developed by dermatologists and scientists using cutting-edge research and premium ingredients

provenResults.title: Proven Results
provenResults.description: Clinically tested products with expert recommendations for their efficacy and safety

forAllSkin.title: For All Skin Types
forAllSkin.description: Comprehensive solutions for sensitive, dry, oily, combination, and mature skin
